field_organizers.processed: Center for East Asian Studies at the University of Pennsylvania

field_description.processed: Momotaro: Sacred Sailors (桃太郎 海の神兵) was released in 1945. In English, the film is sometimes referred to as Momotaro's Divine Sea Warriors. It is the first Japanese feature-length animated film, directed by Mitsuyo Seo. It was released in 1945.
